resolution.summary: Investigated 4 trace discrepancies. All are simulator bugs: (1) LIL/LIU read-modify-write creates false pipeline dependency — HW does direct partial write, (2) same root cause as #1, (3) JAL saves PC+1 instead of PC+2, (4) Z flag not gated to R/S-type only. Filed 3 bug annotations in anem16sim project.
